column2: The A-B elevator was our elevator, the elevator on which the paramedics came up at 9:20 p.m., the elevator on which they took John (and me) downstairs to the ambulance at 10:05 p.m.
If you do not tell me everything I need to know by-he looked at the watch on his wrist-"by ten-oh-five tomorrow night, you will be executed. You and the three exnays."
